newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China Vanke details 96 dividend plans.
newsitem.headline: China Vanke details 96 dividend plans.

text.p: Conglomerate China Vanke Co Ltd on Thursday said it would make a 1.5-for-10 bonus issue plus a pre-tax cash dividend of 0.1 yuan per share for its A and B shareholders based on 1996 profits.
The dividend registration deadline is June 26 and Vanke's A and B shares will go ex-dividend the following day, the company said in a statement in the Shenzhen-based Securities Times.
Bonus B shares will be listed on July 7, and bonus A shares on July 3, the statement said.
Vanke will pay the cash dividend to B shareholders in Hong Kong dollars, with the exchange rate set at HK$1 to 1.0701 yuan, it said.
Vanke, based in the southern Chinese boomtown of Shenzhen adjacent to Hong Kong, is involved in property development, industry and retail operations.
The company posted a net profit of 152 million yuan for 1996, compared with 155 million yuan for 1995 based on international accounting standards.
